Accomplishments__c:
• Administer Salesforce CRM for 400+ users, ensuring system security, data integrity, and platform performance.
  • Automated Community Contact and User Creation, saving 10 minutes per pair and achieving a 100% reduction in time for this task.
  • Integrated Power Automate with Salesforce for on-demand automated creation of Salesforce and Salesforce Platform Users including Permission Set Assignment and Group Membership saving 20 minutes per user and achieving a 90% reduction in time for this task.
  • Configure and maintain Salesforce Experience Cloud sites to enhance user engagement for over 10,000 users.
  • Develops and customizes Apex solutions, Flow automations, custom objects, and Lightning Web Components.
Name: Application Administrator
